> The range of the values for the actual graphic data is 0-255 because 
 it is using single bytes for the array. Hope that helps.

Thanks.  Now I understand.  I am going to create grid map using all 
those values so I can tell my Random Scenario Generator not to put 
objects on top of tiles that have certain values.
